text:
HubSpot api Get message history for a thread -createdAt descending not working for me?
This is pulled straight from HubSpot
```import requests

url = "<https://api.hubapi.com/conversations/v3/conversations/threads/1799254766/messages>"

querystring = {"sort":"createdAt"}

headers = {
    'accept': "application/json",
    'authorization': "Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"
    }

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers, params=querystring)

print(response.text)```
And producing an error

All good!

Thanks for the direction. I actually got it working!!
